article: a russian economic minister called in an interview published monday for a rapid resolution to the crisis surrounding oil giant yukos that has stunned foreign investors and deeply unsettled the political climate less than five months before parliamentary elections .
abstract: russian economy minister calls for quick end to crisis over oil giant yukos
